title: Composite Apps and Antivia Partner to Deliver Dashboards That Engage the Entire Organization
text:
Composite Apps and Antivia Partner to Deliver Dashboards That Engage the Entire Organization
Irvine, CA, August 30, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Business intelligence (BI) solutions providers Composite Apps and international software company Antivia today announced a partnership that will deliver beautifully designed and engineered dashboards for customers. The dashboards will be created with Antivia's DecisionPoint™ software using Composite Apps proven, design-centric approach that streamlines requirements and delivers business value, fast.
Composite Apps has a cross-functional skillset, bringing together excellence in design, extensive experience with complex data environments and first-class business analysis skills to deliver compelling and engaging dashboards that bring an organization’s numbers to life to help foster a data-driven culture.
To support their approach, the team at Composite Apps needs to work with technology that’s flexible enough to deliver their signature user friendly and powerful solutions that engage clients and drive user adoption; they also need tools that provide an agile environment necessary for rapid development and responsiveness to client requirements.
Composite Apps get all of this with Antivia’s business intelligence software, DecisionPoint™, which makes it easy for the Composite Apps team to create stunning interactive dashboards without coding.
Norm Katz, Head of Sales, Marketing, & Business Development at Composite Apps, said: “We’re passionate about data and design, and DecisionPoint™ is a technology that allows us to bring the two together to benefit our customers.”
The partnership will ensure customers enjoy powerful, informative and user-friendly analytics that can be delivered effectively to large numbers of user across an enterprise. In fact, these dashboards are so intuitive that people can just pick them up and use them without needing any training. Ultimately, this means more people have the actionable information they need to make smart, data-driven decisions for their organization.
Mark Hudson, CEO of Antivia, said: “Antivia has been looking to establish a center of excellence in DecisionPoint™ skills on the West Coast, and we feel we have found a perfect partner in Composite Apps. They have the right approach to delivering information across an organization with a sharp focus on user adoption, which reflects our core values.”
